entry.title: Guidance
entry.content:
AllLink-official

Hello everyone, welcome to our website!

We Focus on making everyone chat online without hindrance all over the world and study free. You can learn topics as following.

  1. Free VPN Software/Proxy Tools (mainly free software)
  2. Useful learning websites
  3. Study sources (PDF)
  4. AI/Machine Learning
  5. Computer Science (CS)
  6. Data Science (DS)
  7. Biology/Bioscience/Life Science/Medicine
  8. Chemistry
  9. Physics
  10. Mathematics

Note: allowed to be used for study; not allowed to be commercial

Our blogs

  • 01ink
  • AllLink-official
  • AllLink-official-blog
  • AllLinkofficial
  • OLink-official
  • OLink-official-blog
  • oLink0
  • 0Link-official-blog
  • Lee Felyâ€™s Blog

entry.title: proxy_tools
entry.content:
Proxy Tools

After reading this post, we strongly recommend you read Guidance to understand our purpose.

Due to the policies of some countries or regions, many people cannot search associated-content by Google/Youtube for studying, therefor we list mainly useful APP to achive it. We summarize the APP(Android, iOS/iPadOS/MacOS, Windows, Linux) and provide you links. Because of open sources, theyâ€™re very safe.

Android

  • V2RayNG https://github.com/2dust/v2rayNG/releases/latest

Soft Router/è½¯è·¯ç”±

The soft router refers to a software-based router that uses regular computer hardware and software to perform routing tasks, as opposed to hardware-based routers which are dedicated devices designed specifically for network routing.
